# react_perf/jsx-no-new-object-as-prop <Badge type="info" text="Perf" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Prevent Objects that are local to the current method from being used as values of JSX props

```jsx
// Bad
<Item config={{}} />
<Item config={new Object()} />
<Item config={Object()} />
<Item config={this.props.config || {}} />
<Item config={this.props.config ? this.props.config : {}} />

// Good
<Item config={staticConfig} />
```

## References

- [Rule Source](https://github.com/oxc-project/oxc/blob/main/crates/oxc_linter/src/rules/react_perf/jsx_no_new_object_as_prop.rs)
